SEARCH
Package ca.openosp.openo.hospitalReportManager

Class SFTPConnector

java.lang.Object
ca.openosp.openo.hospitalReportManager.SFTPConnector
public class SFTPConnector extends Object
SFTP Connector to interact with servers and return the server's reply/file data.

      Parameters:

      printInfo -
      Returns:
      Throws:
      com.jcraft.jsch.SftpException

    • downloadDirectoryContents

      public String[] downloadDirectoryContents(String serverDirectory) throws Exception
      Download the contents of the specified directory on the server side. The presumption is made for OMD where the user has to fetch all contents from the user's home directory. Thus a "./" is prepended to each folder requested on the server. If you don't prepend the "./" before the folder directory, JSch will use the "/" directory (root dir).
      Parameters:
      serverDirectory - directory on server side to fetch contents
      Returns:
      array of full path filenames
      Throws:
      Exception - custom error messages if Java is unable to create a folder in /tmp/oscar-sftp and parent dirs

    • deleteDirectory

      public void deleteDirectory(String serverDirectory) throws com.jcraft.jsch.SftpException
      Given a server-side directory, go in and delete all files
      Parameters:
      serverDirectory -
      Throws:
      com.jcraft.jsch.SftpException

    • deleteDirectoryContents

      public void deleteDirectoryContents(String serverDirectory, String[] filenames) throws com.jcraft.jsch.SftpException
      Given a directory and the filenames of the directories (already pre-determined) go in the directory and delete each file.
      Parameters:
      serverDirectory - the directory onto which to remove contents
      filenames - a String array of filenames of the directory, pre-fetched specifically for the directory.
      Throws:
      com.jcraft.jsch.SftpException
